
*****************
Two line to train
*****************

.. panels::
    :card: + intro-card text-center
    :column: col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 d-flex

    .. code-block:: bash
        :caption: Install using `pip <https://pypi.org/project/fedsim>`__:

        pip install fedsim


    ---

    .. code-block:: bash
        :caption: Train MNIST on 1000 clients:

        fedsim-cli fed-learn -n 1000
